original: Sattamabhaviko puggalo nirayaṁ upapajjeyya, tiracchānayoniṁ upapajjeyya, pettivisayaṁ upapajjeyyāti?
Tena hi sattamabhavikassa puggalassa pahīnā duggatīti.
Saṁvaro kammaṁ tatheva asaṁvaro, sabbakammaṁ savipākaṁ, saddo vipāko, saḷāyatanaṁ
vipāko, sattakkhattuparamo puggalo sattakkhattuparamatāniyato, kolaṅkolapuggalo kolaṅkolatāniyato,
ekabījī puggalo ekabījitāniyato, diṭṭhisampanno puggalo sañcicca pāṇaṁ jīvitā voropeyya,
diṭṭhisampannassa puggalassa pahīnā duggati, tatheva sattamabhavikassāti.
